sub_title: Senior adviseur portfoliomanagement - PPO Zee & Delta Rijkswaterstaat
summary:
Currently working in the program and projects department of Rijkswaterstaat Zee & Delta.

Can be described as an enthusiastic, ambitious and motivated person with strong drive to add value to each project. Manuel adapts quickly to new environments and situations. 

I have worked as strategy & management consultant, data analyst, project / change leader, product owner and scrum master and always work with great pleasure and commitment on each required organizational level to achieve the desired results of the organization. I am committed, result driven, analytical, strong entrepreneurial mindset, good communicator, both autonomous and a team-player/builder.

My skills, expertise and experience lie in the areas of:
- Strategy development and organization design
- Project-, Process-,and Change management
- Program / portfolio control
- Risk & Compliance
- Regulatory Reporting
- Business Case development
- New Business development
- Knowledge Management
- Reorganization & Transformation
- Corporate Law
- Business Intelligence and Management Information 
- Data Management, Data Quality, Issue management,

During his education Manuel was co-owner / entrepreneur of a real-estate development orientated limited (Ltd.) in Asia which is successfully sold in January 2012. Manuel is known for his strong commitment to turn each project into a success. 

After completing his bachelors in Law&Business economics, Manuel completed his masters in Corporate Law and Business Administration (strategy & organization). The combination of experience in the topics of Strategy, Management Consulting, Business Economics, Business Administration, Change & IT Project Management, Financials, Law and Entrepreneurship provides Manuel with a strong fundament as a person and consultant. Manuel sees himself as a conceptual thinker, with an eye for both the human as well as the business aspects in order to achieve his goals.

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Laws (LL.B.), minor business economics

profile_positions.description:
Advisering Portfoliomanagement en MT t.a.v. sturing op programma’s en onderhoudsprojecten primair gericht op projecten in het beheergebied van RWS Zee & Delta.

Vanuit de afdeling draag ik bij aan de ontwikkeling van de vakgebieden Projectmanagement, Programmamanagement en Portfoliomanagement binnen het Aanleg- en Onderhoudsproces van Rijkswaterstaat.
profile_positions.title: Senior adviseur portfoliomanagement - PPO Zee & Delta

profile_positions.description:
Within Finance (accounting) change department advising & leading our data management team, in the roles of product owner/ project lead, towards the implementation of a large data quality framework BI-project.

Focus on improving data quality for regulatory reports within in the Finance & Reporting chain by building up a specialized team which primairly focusses on:
- implementing data management process (and governance) to get insight in the companies quality of the data
- defining data validation requirements
- implementing automated data validation requirements in "Informatica data quality" (IDQ) tool
- defining change requirements to solve found data quality issues with structural solutions
- delivery of management information for steering purposes

Training & certificates:
- Data management (DMBOK) 
- Data lineage 
- Data quality (Capgemini academy)
- Yellow Lean Belt
- Green Lean Belt (external training MKPC.nl)
- Mental Power 1 (external personal skills training)
profile_positions.title: Business developer (Finance Change & IT department)

profile_positions.description:
Worked as financial change lead for the financial accounting division within the CFO-column of ABNAMRO. Focus on projects and changes impacting the regulatory reporting chain.

Training and certificates: 
- Requirements & Acceptation Criteria development (Sysqa.nl external training)
- Micro Strategy data-analyst (external training)
- Basel 2 & 3 
- COREP report

profile_positions.title: Change Lead

profile_positions.description:
Projects:
*September 2013 - July 2014: Consultant and Project manager within large takeover program relating to the acquisition of Friesland Bank (Assurantiën) by Rabobank and Achmea. Main focus: strategy and execution regarding the smooth migration and transition of products and clients to Rabobank;
*May 2013 - September 2013: program portfolio controller (budget/finance) for Friesland Bank (Assurantiën) within large merger and acquistion program aiming for a smooth takeover of Friesland Bank (Assurantiën) by Rabobank and Achmea. 
*February 2013 - March 2013:  as information analyst working on data-alignment between two pay-roll systems (ADP & Global View) for ATOS HR Germany. Building database and make queries via MS Access in order to 
- analyse the data-alignement gap
- find data quality issue
- and provide change requirements.

Internal project:
*January 2013 - March 2013: working within the risk, compliance and regulatory reporting practice on the Furture Proof Compliance and FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act) Compliance proposition. Deliverable: FATCA Readiness Scan.

Certificates 2013
-Nibe SVV Bankbedrijf
-ITIL Foundation V3 (EXEN)
-Information Security & Risk Management (e.g. business continuity management) 
-Cheops (Barbara Minto presentation method)

profile_positions.description: Pix2Paint produces and delivers beautiful hand-made oil paintings and postcards to our customers worldwide. All our artworks are hand-painted by talented painters who take great care in producing your unique piece of art. We deliver paintings based on your uploaded digital images, reproductions of masterpieces and other famous art from our online art gallery, and hand-painted postcards which we can send for you.
